title: Parashant Grand Canyon-Parashant National Monument: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       June 24, 2016 Fire Restrictions in Effect Immediately December 7, 2015 Seasonal Closure of Kelly Point Road Begins on December 8th September 26, 2015 - Public Lands Day Meet Monument Staff on a Driving Tour   For all press inquires, contact the park's Public Information Officer at (435) 688-3377 or by e-mail.
